verses.roman:
bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge avaśya kariba milana
bhakta-gaṇe saṅge lañā yāba 'vṛndāvana'

synonyms: bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge—with all My devotees; avaśya—certainly; kariba—shall do; milana—meeting; bhakta-gaṇe—all the devotees; saṅge—along with Me; lañā—taking; yāba—I shall go; vṛndāvana—to Vṛndāvana-dhāma.
translation: "I thought that once again I would see and meet all the devotees and take them with Me to Vṛndāvana.
